name: Trane HVAC Care
description: Specialized maintenance for Trane heating and cooling systems.

templates.name: Clean CleanEffectsâ„¢ Filter
templates.description: Clean the reusable collection cells in your Trane air cleaner.
instructions: Remove the collection cells from the unit.
Vacuum heavy dust with a soft brush attachment.
Rinse cells with a garden hose (low pressure) or in a tub.
Let dry completely (wait at least 24 hours) before reinstalling.
safetyPrecautions: Ensure cells are bone dry to prevent arcing.

templates.name: Check Trane Error Codes
templates.description: Proactive check of system status via thermostat.
instructions: On your Trane thermostat, go to Menu > Service.
Note any recent error codes (e.g., Err 126).
Consult manual or dealer if persistent errors exist.

name: Sub-Zero Refrigeration
description: Factory recommended maintenance for Sub-Zero built-ins.

templates.name: Vacuum Condenser (Sub-Zero)
templates.description: Critical cleaning to prevent compressor failure in built-in units.
instructions: Use a soft brush vacuum attachment.
Vacuum dust from the condenser fins (move in direction of fins).
safetyPrecautions: Fins are sharp. Do not bend them.

templates.name: Replace Air Purification Cartridge
instructions: Locate the air purification cartridge on the back wall of the fridge.
Grasp the cover and rotate counter-clockwise to remove.
Pop out the old cartridge and insert the new one.
Reset the 'Air Filter' indicator on the control panel.
